name: Everlong
description: Everlong helps people regain control of their health and nutrition by automatically verifying their insurance benefits and providing them personalized care from top-vetted telehealth dietitians for $0 out-of-pocket.
one_liner: Everlong helps people regain control of their health and nutrition by automatically verifying their insurance benefits and providing them personalized care from top-vetted telehealth dietitians for $0 out-of-pocket.
